TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FaultException`1<TDetail> extends System.ServiceModel.FaultException
Public Class FaultException(Of TDetail) Inherits FaultException
generic <typename TDetail> public ref class FaultException : System::ServiceModel::FaultException

typeparam.name: TDetail
typeparam.span: 可序列化的錯誤詳細類型。

span.span: The serializable error detail type.

summary.span: 在用戶端應用程式中用於攔截以合約方式指定的 SOAP 錯誤。

span.span: Used in a client application to catch contractually-specified SOAP faults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請攔截 用戶端應用程式中的 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 物件，以處理已在作業合約中以合約方式指定的 SOAP 錯誤。Catch the object in a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client application to handle a SOAP fault that has been contractually specified in an operation contract. 一般部署的服務會使用 來正式指定所有的 SOAP 錯誤，用戶端可預期以一般正常的作業過程來接收。Typical deployed services use the to formally specify all SOAP faults that a client can expect to receive in the normal course of an operation. 中的錯誤資訊會顯示為(其中參數是在作業中指定的可序列化的錯誤物件) 時到達用戶端應用程式。Error information in a appears as a (where the typeparameter is the serializable error object specified in the operation's ) when it arrives at a client application. 可用於指定雙向服務方法和非同步方法組的 SOAP 錯誤。The can be used to specify SOAP faults for both two-way service methods and for asynchronous method pairs. 由於 是 因而也是 ，如果要攔截指定的 SOAP 錯誤，請確定在 和 型別之前，先攔截 型別，或在其中一個例外狀況處理常式中處理指定的例外狀況。Because is both a and therefore a , to catch specified SOAP faults make sure you catch the types prior to the and types or handle the specified exceptions in one of those exception handlers. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 來指定 ，其中型別參數為 ，字串值會指派給用戶端應用程式中的 屬性；用戶端無法藉由呼叫 方法來擷取該字串。If you use to specify a where the type parameter is a , the string value is assigned to the property in the client application; clients cannot retrieve that string by calling the method. 若要在用戶端應用程式呼叫 時傳回字串值，請在該作業內擲回一個 例外狀況，並將字串傳遞給建構函式。To have the string value returned when the client application calls , throw a exception inside the operation and pass the string to the constructor. > 一般而言，建議詳細類型為適合錯誤的自訂可序列化型別，而不是 。In general, it is recommended that detail types be custom serializable types appropriate to the fault and not a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範服務如何使用 型別，擲回轉換成由 所指定之 SOAP 錯誤的 Managed 例外狀況。The following code example shows how a service uses the type to throw a managed exception that gets converted into the SOAP fault specified by the . [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/services.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示用戶端程式碼看起來時所使用的用戶端匯入[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)。The following code example shows how the client code looks when imported by the client using the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md). 下列程式碼範例示範用戶端如何攔截 型別，該型別表示在作業合約中指定的自訂 SOAP 錯誤。The following code example shows how a client can catch the type that represents the custom SOAP fault specified in the operation contract. [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細資料物件必須是可序列化的，否則會在序列化 時擲回例外狀況。The detail object must be serializable or an exception is thrown when the is serialized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範服務如何使用 型別，擲回轉換成由 所指定之 SOAP 錯誤的 Managed 例外狀況。The following code example shows how a service uses the type to throw a managed exception that gets converted into the SOAP fault specified by the . [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/services.vb#1)]
